pr_title: [hotfix][docs] Update currentInputNWatermark metrics docs including N-ary operator

timeline.bodyText: I see this metric is still there. Shouldn't we mark it deprecated (in docs) instead of removing, to avoid forcing users to update their monitoring scripts?
timeline.author: rkhachatryan
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -1470,19 +1470,11 @@ Certain RocksDB native metrics are available but disabled by default, you can fi Gauge - Operator - currentInput1Watermark

replies.bodyText: But we are not deprecating or removing it. There used to be just currentInput1Watermark and currentInput2Watermark. Since then I've added currentInput3Watermark, ...,  currentInputNWatermark
replies.author: pnowojski

timeline.author: rkhachatryan

Note: Only for operators with 2 inputs.

- - Gauge - - - currentInput2Watermark - - The last watermark this operator has received in its second input (in milliseconds). -

Note: Only for operators with 2 inputs.

+ The last watermark this operator has received in its N'th input (in milliseconds). For example currentInput1Watermark, currentInput2Watermark, ...
